director.name: 考特·克朗道尔 Court Crandall

introduction: There are so many lines that divide us as people: race, religion, money. What if there was one line that brought us all together? What if you could be the one who helps us put eight exceptional students at the free throw line of Compton High School with the opportunity to win a college scholarship worth $40,000? Wouldn't that be a pretty special line to be part of? Introducing, "Free Throw," the documentary/charity event created by Court Crandall, an advertising creative director, screenwriter of the films "Old School" and "A Lobster Tale" and author of the children's book, "Hugville." After watching his son grow up playing basketball with a number of boys from Compton, Calif., Court decided he wanted to do something to help provide these children with an opportunity they might not have otherwise. He also wanted to do something to highlight... Written by Court Crandall
